<body>
    <header>
        <h1>Investigation of UAV Detection in Images with Complex Backgrounds and Rainy Artifacts</h1>
    </header>

    <div class="container">
        <div class="section">
            <h2>About the Project</h2>
            <p>
                This project focuses on detecting Unmanned Aerial Vehicles (UAVs) in images with complex backgrounds and rainy artifacts. We have implemented and evaluated four state-of-the-art (SOTA) object detection models:
            </p>
            <ul>
                <li><strong>Faster-RCNN</strong></li>
                <li><strong>RetinaNet</strong></li>
                <li><strong>YOLOv5</strong></li>
                <li><strong>YOLOv8</strong></li>
            </ul>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <h2>Download Weights</h2>
            <p>Pre-trained weights for the models can be downloaded from the following links:</p>
            <ul>
                <li><a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1gkNbyStZ6P4h4cNn146-x8hhJHxhmOyP/view?usp=sharing" target="_blank">YOLOv5 Weights</a></li>
                <li><a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1PjOGlzB87Dtmxb70wb1n3w2x3YZQevEG/view?usp=sharing" target="_blank">YOLOv8 Weights</a></li>
                <li><a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1laYF7cIty_65na-uYQIbTVxXi83ewj61/view?usp=sharing" target="_blank">Faster-RCNN Weights</a></li>
                <li><a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1zT6kBEEBPtpU1EbgbYkesF35FuKI9UhA/view?usp=sharing" target="_blank">RetinaNet Weights</a></li>
            </ul>
        </div>

        <div class="section">
            <h2>Download Dataset</h2>
            <p>The <strong>Complex Background Dataset (CBD)</strong> used for training and evaluation can be downloaded from the following link:</p>
            <ul>
                <li><a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1-BmnQe9LllS7EA4NhGGj-2f7MKZjfnR-/view?usp=sharing" target="_blank">CBD Dataset</a></li>
            </ul>
        </div>
